Authors: Novita N., Novela E.S., Scherly H.
Title: Marketing mix analysis that influence the purchasing decisions of wine in DKI Jakarta and Tangerang
Source title: Proceedings - 11th 2016 International Conference on Knowledge, Information and Creativity Support Systems, KICSS 2016
Affiliations: International Business Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Novita, N., International Business Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Novela, E.S., International Business Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Scherly, H., International Business Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: The increased consumption of wine in Indonesia is clearly visible due to the increasing number of outlets that sell wine following the economy growth in Indonesia. The purpose of this research is to analyse the effect of product, price, place and promotion to purchase decision in DKI Jakarta and Tangerang. This research using quantitative method, number of respondents involve in this study are 150 wine consumer. Using multiple linear regression analysis technique, results of this research indicate that product, price, promotion and place influence the purchasing decisions of wine in Jakarta and Tangerang. © 2016 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Place; Price; Product; Promotion; Purchase decision; Wine
Index Keywords: Costs; Linear regression; Regression analysis; Sales; Place; Price; Product; Promotion; Purchase decision; Wine
